meanings.definition: A small character part in a play or movie, typically played by a well-known actor.
meanings.sent1: In the school play, the famous actress had a cameo as the wise old grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The movie star made a cameo appearance in the film, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cameo by the comedian added a touch of humor to the serious drama.
meanings.sent4: Her unexpected cameo in the scene brought a burst of energy to the film.
meanings.sent5: The cameo by the singer left a lasting impression on the viewers.

meanings.definition: A piece of jewelry, typically oval in shape, on which a portrait or relief is carved in profile.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful cameo necklace that belonged to her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop displayed a variety of intricate cameo brooches.
meanings.sent3: The cameo on her bracelet depicted a delicate flower design.
meanings.sent4: The cameo on the ring seemed to hold a mysterious story within its carving.
meanings.sent5: The cameo earrings sparkled under the light, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A short literary sketch or portrait.
meanings.sent1: The author included a cameo of his friend in the novel as a tribute.
meanings.sent2: The magazine published a cameo of the famous artist in their latest issue.
meanings.sent3: The cameo of the quirky neighbor in the story brought a smile to the readers.
meanings.sent4: The writer's cameo of the bustling cityscape painted a vivid picture in the readers' minds.
meanings.sent5: The literary magazine featured a cameo of the poet, capturing her essence beautifully.
